entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_1_1: My partner needs to get back here fast.  We're going to be late for a meeting and I'm all alone.  Can you go get my partner?
entries.npc_2_1: Excellent.  We'll pay you when you get back.
entries.npc_3_1: Well, if you can't help me I hope I can find someone who can.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go.  It needs some ink, but you'll never have one better.
entries.player_2_1: Nah, I don't feel like it.
entries.npc_1_2: My partner was at an auction selling some assets for capital.  I need someone to find and bring them back.  Can you help?
entries.npc_2_2: Great.  I'll make sure the message gets through that you're coming.
entries.npc_3_2: That's too bad.  I'll find somebody useful.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  See I had good seats, and I didn't let them tear it.  You should be able to get something for it if you want.
entries.player_1_2: No problem.  I was looking for something to do.
entries.player_2_2: Sorry, I'm a bit busy at the moment.
entries.npc_4_1: Merger.  There's a lot of paperwork to sign and I'm not authorized to do it alone.
entries.npc_4_2: It's an autographed trophy from some sports figure.  I don't know who he is, but apparently it sold well.
entries.player_3_1: What kind of meeting is it?
entries.npc_takeme_1: Great, you're here.  We don't want to be late for this meeting so let's get back quickly.
entries.npc_takeme_2: Oh good, you made it.  I got the money transferred to our bank, but I'm lost out here.  Should have hired a guide, huh?
entries.escortother: I don't think I'm the person you're looking for.
entries.dontknowyou: I don't know who you are, but I'm not going with you.
